nodes.text: The V'shar system was a Wild Space star system that contained the planet V'shar. V'shar was the homeworld of the sentient Ka'hren species, of which there were at least 2.5 million members on the planet.

By 2 ABY, the Ka'hren scholar Kaltor Naklian had left V'shar and traveled to the Mid Rim world of Zuliria, where he had become a founding member of the Zulirian Swordmasters group of bladed weapons aficionados.
The V'shar system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square U-15.
